entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
